oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Lard & Nancy (Copeland) Hammock
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of Lard & Nancy (Copeland) Hammock. Lard Hammock was in Company E, 8th Tennessee Cavalry (13th), from Overton County. He was captured near Woodbury, Tennessee, on September 6, 1864, at the Battle of Readyville. He was sent to Camp Chase prison in Ohio. He is buried in Mullins Cemetery in Overton County, Tennessee.
